items.title: Enhance Plugin Daemon Performance in Dify ðŸš€
items.summary: This update optimizes the plugin daemon by introducing a Redis lock mechanism to prevent duplicate sync tasks during user logins. Additionally, the deployment configuration has been updated to increase resource limits and replicas for better performance. Unit tests have been added to ensure the new functionality works as intended.

items.title: Upgrade to Ruff Formatter in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update replaces the previous flake8 formatter with ruff across the codebase. Key changes include modifications to various files, enhancing code quality and consistency. The CI workflow has also been updated to reflect this change, ensuring that future code checks utilize ruff for linting.

items.summary: This update introduces the Producer plugin, which integrates Ace Data Cloud Producer APIs into Dify. items.title: Resolve Plugin Installation Error in Dify ðŸš€
items.summary: This update addresses an installation error related to plugins by modifying the plugin service logic. Key changes include enhancements to error handling and validation processes, ensuring a smoother installation experience for users. The code has been thoroughly tested and documentation updated accordingly.

items.title: Enhance Plugin Item Verification in Dify ðŸŽ‰
items.summary: This update improves the verification display for plugins in the Dify application. Key changes include adjustments to the PluginItem component to show a verified badge for the 'acedatacloud' author and updates to related tests. These enhancements ensure better visibility and accuracy of plugin information for users.

items.title: Resolve plugin installation and model initialization issues in Dify ðŸš€
items.summary: This update addresses critical issues with plugin installation and the model initializer for AceDataCloud. The changes are expected to improve user experience and reliability when using AceDataCloud plugins.

items.title: Resolved plugin auto-install issues in Dify ðŸš€
items.summary: This update fixes the plugin auto-install functionality, ensuring smoother integration for users. Key modifications were made in the plugin service and several provider YAML files to enhance productivity tags. Additionally, tests were updated to validate these changes effectively.

items.title: Enhance audio handling with new artist consistency action in Platform Service ðŸŽ¶
